commands./start:
Hello, i'm bot
Available help commands:
/github
/help_dice
/help_newyear, /help_summer
/help_random
/help_where, /help_location
/help_chat_id
/help_unix_time
/help_holiday
/help_rgb
commands./help_dice: /dice N-edged M times - bot throws N-edged dice M times
commands./help_where: /where - bot gives location with coordinates (/locations - shows locations list)
commands./locations: Paris, Berlin, London, Washington, Tokyo, Beijing
commands./help_location: /location <latitude> <longitude> - shows place with these coordinates on map
commands./help_rgb: /rgb <Red> <Green> <Blue>- shows color specified in RGB format
